Video Stream Decoding Sample
Status: No Product Connected
Aircraft Encoder Error
Solution: Please restart aircraft, if the problem persists, contact DJI Support
Hardware malfunction: Contact DJI Support to arrange for repairs
Aircraft updating.
Solution: Wait for the update complete.
In Flight
Battery cell is broken
Solution: Stop using the battery, and contact DJI customer service.
Battery discharge overcurrent
Solution: Check the load that the aircraft is carrying. A heavy load may lead overcurrent. Please reduce excessive motion during flight
Low temperature environment: Battery not suitable for flight
Solution: Warm the battery to five degrees Celsius and try using it again
Battery needs a complete process of charging and discharging. Or else, battery level may drop during flight and affect the safety of your flight.
Solution：After flight finishes, please discharge battery to 5%% or below. Charge the battery to 50%% for long-term storage
Battery discharge overheat
Solution: Stop flight, cool the battery to room temperature, and try again
Camera Error (error code 01)
Solution: Restart the aircraft, if the problem persists, contact DJI Support
Camera has overheated
Solution: Allow the camera to cool and try again
Camera sensor error
Hardware malfunction: Contact DJI Support to arrange for repairs
Aircraft upgrade error
Solution: Please try again and follow all of the instructions provided
Battery connection to the center board has failed
Hardware malfunction: Contact DJI Support to arrange for repairs
GPS connection to the center board has failed
Hardware malfunction: Contact DJI Support to arrange for repairs
MC connection to the center board has failed
Solution: Restart the aircraft, if the problem persists, contact DJI Support
Accelerometer failed
Solution: Please restart aircraft, if the problem persists, contact DJI Support
Accelerometer failed
Solution: Please restart aircraft, if the problem persists, contact DJI Support
Aircraft moving detected
Solution: please keep the aircraft stationary and level. Contact DJI Support if the error persists
Aircraft moving detected
Wait before take off
Aircraft attitude angle is too large
Solution: Please place the aircraft on a flat surface and restart. If the problem persists, contact DJI Support
Barometer error
Solution: Please restart aircraft, if the problem persists, contact DJI Support
Barometer initialization failed
Solution: Please restart aircraft, if the problem persists, contact DJI Support
Barometer error
Solution: Please restart aircraft, if the problem persists, contact DJI Support
IMU calibration required
Solution: Calibrate the IMU
Compass abnormal

Solution: 1. Ensure there are no magnets or metal objects near the aircraft. The ground or walls may contain metal. Move away from sources of interference before attempting flight. 2. Calibrate Compass Before Takeoff.
Compass error
Solution: 1.Move the aircraft to another place and restart it; 2.Calibrate Compass if the error persists
Compass need restart
Solution: Restart aircraft
Compass error
Solution: Please restart aircraft, if the problem persists, contact DJI Support
Data recorder errors
Solution: Please restart the aircraft, If the problem persists, contact DJI Support
Gyroscope error
Solution: Please restart aircraft, if the problem persists, contact DJI Support
Gyroscope error
Solution: Please restart aircraft, if the problem persists, contact DJI Support
Please contact DJI Support
Hardware malfunction: Contact DJI Support to arrange for repairs
IMU error
Solution: Please calibrate IMU
IMU calibration incomplete
Solution: Please recalibrate the IMU
IMU data error
Solution: Please place aircraft on a flat and restart. If the problem persists, contact DJI Support
IMU error, please contact DJI Support.
Hardware malfunction: Contact DJI Support to arrange for repairs
IMU initialization failed
Solution: Please restart aircraft, if the problem persists, contact DJI Support
IMU error
Solution: Check IMU Installation Direction
IMU error
Solution: Move away from ground magnetic interference.
IMU calibration required
Solution: Calibrate the IMU
Do not use standard Propellers at high altitudes.
Do not use Plateau Propellers at low altitudes.
Normal
Unknown Error. Error ID (%d)
GPS Not Connected
Calibration Complete. Restart the aircraft
IMU Disconnected
Calibration Data Error. Recalibrate Remote Controller.
Calibration Incomplete. Recalibrate Remote Controller
Centre Position Out of Range. Recalibrate Remote Controller
Remote Controller Calibrating
Remote Controller Mapping Error
Data Logger Error. Contact DJI Support if this continues after restart
Accelerometer\'s bias is too large. Please restart the aircraft. Contact DJI Support if the error persists
Accelerometer stuck. Please restart the aircraft. Contact DJI Support if the error persists
Aircraft Type Error
Please disconnect the USB cable from your aircraft
IMU is initializing. Do not move the aircraft until initialization is complete
The aircraft’s angle is too great. Place aircraft on a flat, level surface and restart. Contact DJI Support if the error persists
Barometer Error. Contact DJI Support if this continues after restart
Barometer stuck. Please restart the aircraft. Contact DJI Support if the error persists
Barometer value is negative. Please restart the aircraft. Contact DJI Support if the error persists
Barometer\'s noise is too high. Please restart the aircraft. Contact DJI Support if the error persists
Battery Authentication Failed. Contact DJI Support if this continues after restart
Battery cell broken, please replace the battery
Battery Communication Error. Check Battery Connection
Battery signal error. Please make sure your battery is produced by DJI and check the battery connection. If the problem persists, please contact DJI customer service.
Battery initialization incomplete, restart the motors
Insert Additional Batteries.
Battery Voltage Difference too large. Check Battery Status
Battery Voltage Difference too large. Check Battery Status
Sensor bias too large. Place aircraft on a flat, level surface and conduct IMU calibration
Compass Error. Restart Required. Contact DJI Support if this persists
Compass calibration required
Compass stuck. Please restart the aircraft. Contact DJI Support if the error persists
Compass error, calibration required
Compass mod value is too large. Please restart the aircraft. Contact DJI Support if the error persists
Compass\'s noise is too high. Please restart the aircraft. Contact DJI Support if the error persists
Device Locked
Device Topology Error. Restart and Check Connection.
The distance between the aircraft and the Home Point is greater than the pre-set maximum distance. The aircraft cannot takeoff.
ESC status error. Please restart the aircraft. Contact DJI Support if the error persists
Invalid Serial Number
FLASH Operating
Gimbal Error. Contact DJI Support if this persists after restart
Updating Gimbal
Gimbal Gyroscope Error. Contact DJI Support if this persists after restart
Gimbal Tilt Motor Error. Contact DJI Support if this continues after restart
Vibrations detected in gimbal pitch axis. Secure camera position or reduce gain value
Gimbal Roll Motor Error. Contact DJI Support if this persists after restart
Vibrations detected in gimbal roll axis. Secure camera position or reduce gain value
Gimbal Pan Motor Error. Contact DJI Support if this persists after restart
Vibrations detected in gimbal pan axis. Secure camera position or reduce gain value
GPS Error. Contact DJI Support if this continues after restart
Gyroscope and Accelerometer Error. Contact DJI Support if this continues after restart.
Gyroscope\'s bias value is too large. Please restart the aircraft. Contact DJI Support if the error persists
Gyroscope stuck. Please restart the aircraft. Contact DJI Support if the error persists
IMU is calibrating, please wait until calibration is complete
IMU is initializing. Do not move the aircraft until initialization is complete
Please check the aircraft’s status
Please contact DJI support
IMU warming up, wait before taking off
Cannot takeoff in a no-fly zone
Aircraft is tilted, please keep the aircraft stationary and level before flight
Low power, please replace the battery
Navigation System Error. Check Redundancy Status.
Please activate the aircraft
Beginner Mode active. Wait until the GPS signal is stable before takeoff
Cannot takeoff in travel mode. Please exit travel mode
Warning: Critically Low Battery. Charge Battery Before Flight.
Low voltage, please replace the battery
Flight simulator initialization failed, please try again
Flight simulator closed, please restart the aircraft
Low power, please replace the battery
Invalid Software Data. Contact DJI Support if this continues after restart
Some Modules Not Configured
Low battery temperature, warm or replace the battery
Unknown error (code: %d) , cannot take off, please contact DJI support.
Aircraft is upgrading, please wait until the upgrade is complete
Version Mismatch. Check Firmware
Propeller Error
Gimbal gyroscope error
Hardware malfunction: Contact DJI Support to arrange for repairs
Gimbal cannot receive MC data
Solution: Check the 8-pin plug that connects the damping plate and the aircraft. Ensure that none of the pins are loose. If the problem persists, contact DJI Support
Gimbal pitch error
Hardware malfunction: Contact DJI Support to arrange for repairs
Gimbal roll error
Hardware malfunction: Contact DJI Support to arrange for repairs
Gimbal yaw error
Hardware malfunction: Contact DJI Support to arrange for repairs
RC battery error
Hardware malfunction: Contact DJI Support to arrange for repairs
RC encryption error
Hardware malfunction: Contact DJI Support to arrange for repairs
RC FPGA Error
Hardware malfunction: Contact DJI Support to arrange for repairs
RC GPS error
Hardware malfunction: Contact DJI Support to arrange for repairs
RC battery low
Solution: Please recharge the battery
RC is reset, please check RC settings
Solution: Please check the RC’s settings, and ensure that they are correct (especially Mode 2 and Mode 1 settings), then restart the RC
RC is not calibrated
Solution: Please disconnect the RC from aircraft and enter the RC setting menu to calibrate the sticks
RC idle for too long
Solution: Please turn off the RC
Remote Controller Overheated.
Solution: Allow the remote controller to cool off.
RC transmitter error
Hardware malfunction: Contact DJI Support to arrange for repairs
Deserializer disconnected
Hardware malfunction: Contact DJI Support to arrange for repairs
Video decoder encryption error
Hardware malfunction: Contact DJI Support to arrange for repairs
Recalibrate Vision System by DJI Assistant
Vision Sensor Communication Error
Downward Vision Sensor Calibration Error
Forward Vision Sensor Calibration Error
Propeller Guard Mounted
Propeller Guard mounted. Forward Obstacle Sensing will be automatically switched off
Solution: Please restart aircraft, if the problem persists, contact DJI Support
Hardware malfunction: Contact DJI Support to arrange for repairs
Downward Left Vision Sensor Error
Downard Right Vision Sensor Error
Forward Left Vision Sensor Error
Forward Right Vision Sensor Error
Vision System Error
IMU Backup Error. Stop Motors and Check IMU Redundancy
Model Not Available
